articles.description: Trent Boult has expressed his sympathy towards what is going in India and wished to return to the country soon that he says has given him so much.
articles.content: Mumbai Indians pacer Trent Boult has reached New Zealand following the suspension of IPL 2021 amidst the raging coronavirus pandemic in India. The country is now witnessing over four lakh fresh cases… [+1583 chars]
